text: Virtual standup for me. Have a note out to Intel on the i2c issue I was seeing on Edison. Should have a solution this week. Added the broadcast pipe to cap radio on Friday to support pushbutton. Have lots of Brandlab today, but will get 3 cap boards programmed today so we have a few to talk to.
Assembly house should have boards today. I'll track progress.
me: 3d printed caps have arrived. they are oddly sticky and not very springy (low rebound)
will contemplate them and life in general
Continue doing VQA. Focusing on microinteractions and animations on standby for landscape QA.
<@U02E3CRMA> / <@U02F8LF2X> let me know if thereâ€™s anything I can help with.

I'll bring both the printed cap tops to standup tomorrow for people to play with. I hit only one of the SLA printed ones with a 500 grit abralon disk to remove the stickiness and it feeling less weird
